pages.text: And do not be proud (especially) against Allah: Truly, I have come to you with clear authority
As for me, I have prayed to my Lord and your Lord, for safety against your injuring (stoning) me
But if you do not believe, keep yourselves away from me and leave me alone
(But they were angry and haughty) then he cried to his Lord: "Truly, these are a criminal people used to sin
(The reply came:) "March forth with My servants by night, surely, you will be followed
And leave the sea at the gap (across the ocean bed divided): Verily, they are a group to be drowned
How many of the gardens and springs did they leave behind
And green crops (and corn fields) and noble places
And wealth (and things of life), in which they had taken such delight
Like this (was their end)! And We made other people take over (those things they left behind)
And neither heaven nor earth shed a tear for them: And they were not given any relief (again)
And indeed, (before this), We did save the Children of Israel from disgraceful punishment
Caused by Firon (Pharaoh), indeed he was proud (haughty and arrogant, even) among unruly transgressors
And We chose them before above the nations, with knowledge
And granted them Signs in which there was an open trial
Verily, these (People of the Quraish), they openly say
There is nothing beyond our first death, and we shall not be resurrected
Then bring (back) our forefathers, if you say the truth
Are they better than the people of Tubba' and those who were before them? We destroyed them because they were criminals (guilty of sin)
And We did not create the heavens and the earth, and all between them, just as (an idle) play
We did not create them except for true (and noble) ends: But most of them do not understand
